item.description:
50% chance of rain forecast for Sunday so we switch to Grendel's Den...
Welcome to Chap XV of this Nerd Fun snob endeavor, in the heart of intellectual snobbery, Harvard Sq. Be there or be Sq.

 

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/halfprice.html
Grendels has a happy hour menu offering half price for food between 5 & 7:30 with the purchase of a $3.00 drink -- get your order in early because (although there is no TV or loud music) it gets noisier later, the waitstaff become very busy, and the limited seating will be harder to find. Because there are so many signups we may be forced to split into 2 nearby groups. Please bring cash.

WHAT IS MEANT BY Antidisestablishmentarianism? ...snobs were familiar with this term a couple decades ago. It is about how things are rigged in society, it is a reference to the pre-established Rules of the Game, written or unwritten. Example: why is it only cars/ trucks are allowed on the road, and not, say, Boneshaker Velocipedes or Roper Steamcycles? Autogyro's? Motorized Quadricycles? What would happen if, instead of Grey, cars & houses were pink or purple? Who's in charge, anyway? Are humans themselves subject to the collective will of microbes?

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas or--dare I say it--some unanswered question you wish to convey incognito.

The premise is to share your intellectual baffling snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!).

Once this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss, if appropriate. This may lead to much laughter, but others may be baffled & perhaps enlightened.

Humor in good taste: ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel: allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle. Fold-up sunglasses, corduroy jackets w/ elbow patches: allowed. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Please bring cash. Seperate tabs are not encouraged.

When settling the tab, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and gratuity!
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup-- Antidisestablishmentarianism
